Hallo

 Thank you for installing German Clock!

 To use this application you have to add it to your home screen as a widget. First, find an empty place on your home screen and tap your finger, and hold it down on the screen. The screen should change appearance slightly, and you will see "Widgets" appear. Please select "Widgets" and then scroll through all your widgets to find "German Clock". After you find it, just click on it, hold down your finger on the screen, and drag it out to your home screen. That is it! Now you can use your German Clock widget!
